General.Name: Jiangxi Huawu Brake Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Huawu Brake Co.,Ltd. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells industrial brakes and their control systems in China and internationally. It offers brake devices in port machinery, wind power, hoisting machinery, metallurgical and mining machinery, hydraulic engineering, offshore heavy industry, construction machinery, and rail transit braking systems. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Fengcheng, China.
